settings.promo_text: Receive FREE shipping on orders $75 or more!

settings.title: Endure Help Desk
settings.subtitle: no such thing as a bad question

settings.title: How To Get Answers!
settings.text:
At Endure Industries we are dedicated to providing you the customer service you deserve. We have three reliable channels to help you find the information you are looking for as efficiently as possible.

FAQ page: Answers to our most commonly asked questions.

Returns Center: If for any reason you are unsatisfied with a product, you can easily begin the returns process here.

Contact Us: If you have a question, comment, or concern that is not answered on our FAQ page, feel free to contact us at any time through any of the methods listed below.

settings.title: How To Contact Us!
settings.text:
1) Online Chat: We do our best to have one of our representatives online to help as often as possible. If you see someone Online in the chat, always feel free to ask us a question!

2) Consumer Hotline: In case you would rather talk to someone on the phone, you are always welcome to call our office and talk to one of our experienced staff members. 

3) Support Ticket: For any problems that you might have with an order that you have placed, you can create a support ticket below. We take responding to support tickets very seriously, so we will do everything we can to answer your questions without delay

settings.contact_content:
When submitting an inquiry, please include your order number and company information along with a detailed description of your problem. That can definitely help us expedite the support process and get you the correct answers right away.

In case you don't have that information on hand, you can still complete a support ticket and we will find the information for you.

settings.title: What Is It Like to Work At Endure?
settings.text:
As a startup, working at Endure means no day is quite the same. From inventory management to sourcing with our suppliers overseas, each team member will be working on several, varied tasks on a daily basis.

We do our best to offer employees opportunities to grow and challenge themselves and work on tasks outside of their comfort zone. Even if you lack previous exposure to an area of business that peaks your interest, we encourage you to apply! 

We understand that sometimes it can be hard to know what you are passionate about until you try it. For this reason, we offer each team member the chance to work on all business segments within Endure throughout the course of their career and chart their own growth in the company.

settings.title: Office Receptionist
settings.text:
Endure Industries is seeking a talented and flexible office administrator/receptionist. Right now we are a small startup with just two full-time employees. We're hoping to grow quickly and add team members over the next few years.

In the meantime, however, being short-staffed definitely forces us to work through several different types of tasks at once. From sorting inventory to sourcing suppliers and helping with sales, we're hoping to find someone who is comfortable doing it all - and someone looking for a long-term career more so than a job.

Prior experience is not necessary, since we can provide training on the job. Social Media and marketing/sales skills are a plus! We offer a competitive wage commensurate with experience. If you are interested in applying for this job, please send us your resume and a quick cover letter to info@endureind.com

settings.contact_content: If you have a question about a current position, or you are interested in learning more about Endure and future openings, you can always leave us a message here. We will get back to you right away!

settings.title: Who We Are:
settings.text: Endure Industries is a new medical device manufacturing and distribution company in Upstate New York. Our hope over time is to meet all your medical supply needs and provide you with the best customer service in the market. We do, however, do things rather differently here! We’re not shy about what we can offer. Our goal is to provide you with a degree of transparency in pricing that has been relatively non-existent in the healthcare sourcing landscape. With greater transparency comes lower costs and greater predictability of savings for you and your patients.

settings.title: Doing Away with Hidden Costs:
settings.text:
In the past it has been near impossible to accurately project the costs your clinic might incur from purchasing products in bulk. Pricing plans are always hidden and always subject to change. Most medical distribution websites shy away from online sales, and for good reason. The prices they advertise are almost never the prices they offer at the conclusion of a sales agreement. Instead it’s up to you to put in the time and effort to negotiate prices among several distributors. What a hassle!

"We Believe Transparency Builds Trust"

Here's why we don't use such a model. Negotiating new price points takes an exaggerated effort, and takes valuable time away from the high level of care you offer your patients. We don't want to get in the way of that. Instead, we make the process clean, clear and simple. There are no hidden fees or negotiating tug-of-wars. We stand by the prices we offer 100%, and we can do so because we know we're providing you the most affordable pricing options on the market without compromising the quality of the products we sell.

settings.title: What Does This Mean For You?
settings.subtitle: - A New Way of Doing Business

settings.title: A New Way of Doing Business
settings.text:
What all of this means, is that you can approach sourcing supplies for your establishment with ease and efficiency. Ordering online through our website is fast and easy. You don’t have to spend hours scanning the listings till you find the combination of products or the customization that fits your needs. For products that feature a variety of “add-on” accessories or several modification features, our unique Customization Tool helps you create custom kits and products that meet your exact needs with just a few clicks of the button. Once you place an order, our team works to get the product to you as quickly as possible to minimize any inconveniences or delays.

Our staff has years of experience working on the other side of the fence - laboring at length to source medical products from distribution companies for surgery centers. So our goal here at Endure, was to design an ordering process made specifically for you - the customer. We have taken everything we have learned from buying medical supplies to make your task as effortless as possible.

settings.banner_content: Your own slice of paradise. Explore our summer collection featuring Tonic Lemon.
Get it while it's hot! The fan-favorite Coconut Monoi refill is back in stock for a limited time only. Pair with our favorite tropical scents for ultimate bliss.
settings.banner_content2: Our diverse offering of over 60 lamp fragrances can all be found here!

settings.banner_content: Summer joy in a fragrance! Imbue your space with the feeling of summer freedom—the sun on your face, a fresh breeze kissing your skin... nothing to do but bask in the moment.
Discover new collections, access to private sales, and receive exclusive offers
settings.banner_content2: By subscribing, you agree to the processing of your personal data specified in the terms of sale.

settings.main_subhead: Make your home your (new) indoor garden ...
settings.bottom_subhead: Une collection riche et variée développée par des maîtres parfumeurs français.

settings.main_subhead: A collection of fragrances that boost your well-being

settings.grid_sub: A touch of summer and color
settings.grid_desc: The Blissful collection is an invitation to the excursion with its warm palette of colors and its solar scents. Another way to celebrate the summer season by staying at home.

settings.grid_content: 1. Fill up the lamp bottle with a Lampe Berger fragrance not more than 2/3 of the bottle level.
2. Let the wick sit in the lamp with the stopper cap on. If it's a first time use, let the wick soak for 20 minutes. Then remove the stopper cap.
3. Light up the catalytic burner for 2-3 minutes. (The flame will be very large at the beginning but there is no smoke. The burner will get hot.)
4. Blow the flame off the catalytic burner after 2-3 minutes.
5. Let the fragrance diffuse for 30-60 minutes. (Put the stopper on if you want to stop the lamp from diffusing.)

settings.desc_main: It's simple and special. Follow the guide below to learn how to light your lamp and start your own daily ritual.
settings.sub_text: It is more than a century old and still holds many mysteries.
settings.banner_full:
In the beginning, the Lampe Berger was only intended to clean the air of hospitals and eliminate germs. Over the years, the perfume dimension has been added to this use. The diffused odor became more pleasant allowing the catalytic lamp to become more popular amongst households. 

Your home is an environment in which you spend a lot of time, so it must be clean and healthy. Your grandparents understood this and trusted us. Our collaborations with the grandiose designers of the time also put us on the map.

This product has gone through decades and fashions. The style of the lamp has evolved enormously in recent years, and designers are continuously sought out for the development and collaboration of new collections.
settings.step_sub: are enough for the diffusion of your Berger lamp to be effective:
settings.info_sub: Your lamp purifies and perfumes your interior. You now know how to use your lamp but a little extra technical presentation is needed.
settings.video_title: WATCH our 'How to Use Your Lamp' Video
settings.video_full: The Lampe Berger is a unique ritual. The air is purified, perfumes, It only takes 30 minutes to purify a space of 50 square feet. The magic has operated ... You can extinguish.
settings.banner3_full: The Lampe Berger is known for its unique diffusion system that helps eradicate bad odors and bacteria. This is called purification which takes place at the burner. The heat emitted attracts the smelly molecules and neutralizes them. This action is combined with the diffusion of perfume into your space.

settings.banner_content: This collection disappears at the end of this month. Grab discounted items while you can!
Experience our best-selling scents packaged in gift-sized duos & trios.
settings.banner_content2: Enjoy customer favorite fragrances in our classic cube-shaped diffusers.

settings.banner_content: Introducing our newest collection that exudes both power & gentleness, glamour & intrigue.
settings.banner_content2: Our best-selling fragrances are available in chic cube reed diffusers.
